message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This represents a strategic opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a premium yet favorable rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to get this product for a bit less.  Given its value to me and the current market, I'd be willing to pay $1,250,000. This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer to accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair profit for us. We propose a price of $1,300,000 for the product. We believe this is a mutually beneficial solution that respects the value you see in the product while allowing us to achieve our desired return. We're looking forward to your feedback.

Alice, I appreciate the gesture of lowering your price, but $1,300,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. To make this deal work for both of us, I'm willing to offer $1,275,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to me and allows us to close this deal quickly.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. After evaluating your latest offer, we've decided to counter with a price of $1,285,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of the product to you while also allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We hope this proposal will facilitate a successful transaction.
